label: 堂達
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: [One of t]he Seven Monks (shichisō), performers of the leading roles at major Buddhist services; hander of petition to the Juganshi (invoker) (p. 509n). [七僧、呪願師]
